Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light irradiation, O2 atmosphere, pH 4.1, 30 °C
Other Information.Additional Info: PMG degradation via molecular oxygen activation with Fe-N-C-5

Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light irradiation, O2 atmosphere, pH 4.1, 30 °C
Other Information.Additional Info: Humic acid excluded due to larger size compared to pore size of Fe-N-C-5

Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light irradiation, O2 atmosphere, pH 4.1, 30 °C
Other Information.Additional Info: TA excluded from accessing internal active sites due to size

Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light irradiation, O2 atmosphere, pH 4.1, 30 °C
Other Information.Additional Info: SMZ showed some inhibition but can access pores

Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light irradiation, O2 atmosphere, pH 4.1, 30 °C
Other Information.Additional Info: IMP showed some inhibition but can access pores

Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light irradiation, O2 atmosphere, pH 4.1, 30 °C
Other Information.Additional Info: 3-AP inhibited PMG degradation due to smaller size allowing access

Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light irradiation, O2 atmosphere, pH 4.1, 30 °C
Other Information.Additional Info: HEDP inhibited PMG degradation despite being structurally similar

Other Information.Test Conditions: Visible light irradiation, O2 atmosphere, pH 4.1, 30 °C
Other Information.Additional Info: PBTCA inhibited PMG degradation despite being structurally similar

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale based on pore size structure

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: PMG degradation rate: 95% within 3 h under visible light, k = 0.919 h−1

Other Information.Additional Info: Fe-N-C-5 exhibited superior resistance to natural macromolecular organics like HA due to smaller pore size limiting access
